Debrief.GUI.Tote.Painters

Class TotePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Debrief.GUI.Tote.Painters.TotePainter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasType.PaintListener, Editable, StepperListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SnailPainter

    public class TotePainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements StepperListener, CanvasType.PaintListener, Editable
    Class to provide "normal" highlighting, triggered by the stepper control. This class just puts a white rectangle around the point being highlighted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TotePainter

        public TotePainter(PlainChart theChart,
                   Layers theData,
                   AnalysisTote theTote)
        constructor, of course
        Parameters:
        theChart - the chart we will plot onto
        theData - the data we will read from (to find the list of things to plot, aswell as the nearest point to the indicated time)
        theTote - the Tote itself, which we use to determine which are the primary and secondary tracks to highlight
